00034 #ifndef __Plane_H__

00039 #include "OgreVector3.h"

00041 namespace Ogre {
00042 
00053     class _OgreExport Plane
00054     {
00055     public:
00058         Plane ();
00059         Plane (const Plane& rhs);
00061         Plane (const Vector3& rkNormal, Real fConstant);
00062         Plane (const Vector3& rkNormal, const Vector3& rkPoint);
00063         Plane (const Vector3& rkPoint0, const Vector3& rkPoint1,
00064             const Vector3& rkPoint2);
00065 
00070         enum Side
00071         {
00072             NO_SIDE,
00073             POSITIVE_SIDE,
00074             NEGATIVE_SIDE,
00075             BOTH_SIDE
00076         };
00077 
00078         Side getSide (const Vector3& rkPoint) const;
00079 
00084         Side getSide (const AxisAlignedBox& rkBox) const;
00085 
00095         Side getSide (const Vector3& centre, const Vector3& halfSize) const;
00096 
00105         Real getDistance (const Vector3& rkPoint) const;
00106 
00108         void redefine(const Vector3& rkPoint0, const Vector3& rkPoint1,
00109             const Vector3& rkPoint2);
00110 
00112         void redefine(const Vector3& rkNormal, const Vector3& rkPoint);
00113 
00121         Vector3 projectVector(const Vector3& v) const;
00122 
00132         Real normalise(void);
00133 
00134         Vector3 normal;
00135         Real d;
00136 
00138         bool operator==(const Plane& rhs) const
00139         {
00140             return (rhs.d == d && rhs.normal == normal);
00141         }
00142         bool operator!=(const Plane& rhs) const
00143         {
00144             return (rhs.d != d && rhs.normal != normal);
00145         }
00146 
00147         _OgreExport friend std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream& o, const Plane& p);
00148     };
00149 
00150     typedef std::vector<Plane> PlaneList;

00152 } // namespace Ogre
